## Norovirus

```{r datamimport}
library(XML)
library(data.table)
library(here)

# Read XML
NoVXML <- xmlParse(here("data"),"production_areas.xml")

# Convert to List
NoVList <- xmlToList(NoVXML)

# Each List element is a character vector.  Convert each of these into a data.table
NoVList <- lapply(NoVList, function(x) as.data.table(as.list(x)))

# Rbind all the 1-row data.tables into a single data.table
NoV <- rbindlist(NoVList, use.names = T, fill = T)

NoV

```
